name: Mole Invasion
description:
Use arrow keys to move, and the x button to shoot

You're a delicious worm and the moles are hungry! Defend your soil with your rifle, and eat delicious chocolate squares to increase your size and speed! but watch out, those crafty moles have hand granades, and aren't afraid to use them!

MAde for GBJam5, my first submission to a game jam
